suggested_query: The Writing Images and Picturing Text editor WIPTe, as a digital tool, offers a range of possibilities for the manipulation and arrangement of images and text. Through its interface, users can create and edit digital documents that combine images and text in innovative ways, potentially challenging traditional notions of genre and spatiality. The use of WIPTe has the potential to lead to the development of new types of digital texts and interactions.
suggest_context: 3. TEXT EDITOR Companions: The Writing Images and Picturing Text editor WIPTe forms the primary subject of this thesis, as well as its operation and context. How the use of digital technologies reshapes the relationship between resources such as image and writ-ing, and has the potential to significantly reconfigure notions of spatiality and embodiment as well as genre conventions, all of which can lead to adapted and some new types of texts and interactions. Jewitt, 2013, p. 270 pdf
